mapper.select: SELECT p.id as post_id, p.title as post_title, p.content as post_content, p.user_id as post_user_id, u.id as user_id, u.name as user_name, p.created as post_created, p.updated as post_updated FROM "Posts" p, "Users" u WHERE p.user_id = u.id

SELECT p.id as post_id, p.title as post_title, p.content as post_content, p.user_id as post_user_id, u.id as user_id, u.name as user_name, p.created as post_created, p.updated as post_updated FROM "Posts" p, "Users" u WHERE p.user_id = u.id AND p.id = uuid(#{id})
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO "Posts" ( id, title, content, user_id ) VALUES ( uuid_generate_v4(), #{title}, #{content}, uuid(#{user.id}) )
mapper.update: UPDATE "Posts" SET title = #{title}, content = #{content}, updated = now() WHERE id = uuid(#{id}) AND user_id= uuid(#{user.id})
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM "Posts" WHERE id = uuid(#{id}) AND user_id = uuid(#{user.id})
